name: UISnapBehavior
desc: A spring-like behavior whose initial motion is damped over time so that the object settles at a specific point.

items.name: init(item: UIDynamicItem, snapTo: CGPoint)
items.desc: Initializes a snap behavior with a dynamic item and a snap point.

items.name: var snapPoint: CGPoint
items.desc: The point to which to snap.

items.name: var damping: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of oscillation of a dynamic item during the conclusion of a snap.
